title: ISic000879. Epitaph for Agathe
body:
1ἐνθάδε κεῖ-
2τε Ἀγάθη τε-
3λετᾷ τι π͡ρ͡ὸ · δέ-
4κα μ͡ειᾶς κα-
5λαδῶν Ἰε-
6ναρίων
7⳨

l.3 reg., orig. ι | l.4 reg., orig. κα λαδῶν

1ΕΝΘΑΔΕΚΕΙ
2ΤΕΑΓΑΘΗΤΕ
3ΛΕΤΑΤΙΠ͡Ρ͡ΟΔΕ
4ΚΑΜ͡ΕΙΑΣΚΑ
5ΛΑΔΩΝΙΕ
6ΝΑΡΙΩΝ
7⳨

l.3 reg., orig. ι | l.4 reg., orig. κα λαδῶν

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • The text of IG reproduces that of Carini. Both are correct in their representation of the letters on the stone, but omit the interpunct and ligature in line 3, the ligature in line 4, the diaeresis in line 5, and the staurogram at the end of the text; all these features are recorded by Orsi.

English translation

Here lies Agathe. She died 11 days before the kalends of January (22 December) ((staurogram)).

commentary

bibliography

  • 14.0062 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001072
  • Carini 1875 no.10 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002090
  • Orsi 2018 Tacc. 2, p. 3 bis https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002617
  • 1322 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000394
